channel.title: [PI] renaming client.jar [PI] //Tutorial
channel.description:
Hey Mopar-Users, This is my very first post, and tutorial. I am "AWARE" that everyone should know how to rename the client (run.bat), but that's not what I want to get into. If you know how to do this already, don't waist your time here. "[i]Title Says It All[/i]" (I will be spoon-feeding) [b].:BeginnersPurposesONLY.:[/b]
https://dl.dropbox.com/s/5ghquordme3j5p0/Part%204.PNG
[u]Purpose[/u]: helping those who: -uses a PI source -doesn't have GUI.java or JFrame.java file in the Client side -**have signed and made their client.jar**
[b]**NOTE**[/b]: I've haven't seen a tutorial on this topic yet, just questions on it. Let me know if you see a tutorial on this, I'll be willing to delete this, if majority agrees. ;)
[b]Difficulty[/b]: 1/10; [u]The Problem[/u]: [b]The name won't change after trying to change it through GUI.java/JFrame.java/Client.java[/b] https://dl.dropbox.com/s/akruqbmjnz1t8s2/9b8.png
[b]!!Let's Get Start!![/b]
1) Access your: Client Folder. https://dl.dropbox.com/s/bn251s4g12we8sj/part%202.PNG and you'll have something like these https://dl.dropbox.com/s/f5nar9je3cylrno/Part%201.PNG
2) Look for: RSFrame.java https://dl.dropbox.com/s/2l8mf4k3w4vb1wj/sdfjhd.PNG
3) Open; [b]Insome cases: (Right-click>Edit)[/b]: RSFrame.java https://dl.dropbox.com/s/wtd66ssbinomaas/sdfa.PNG You will have something like this: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/s3k2l7016jv23ih/untitled.PNG Look at: setTitle("PvPscapez"); *or what-ever name it is. https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ra5jyg0qn0z34yu/sdhsd.PNG
4) You should know what to do now... setTitle(""Enter Your Client Name Here""); https://dl.dropbox.com/s/gcwagophq7nb2hr/asfsd.PNG Now: Save it.. https://dl.dropbox.com/s/c592eilofr81y17/adgds.PNG
5) Compile: the Client Folder. https://dl.dropbox.com/s/3jy62efol3idwjn/sdgsd.PNG
6) Recreate and Sign your .jar. NOTE: You should know how to do this part, no need to spoonfeed you here.
7) TADAAAH~ a successfull change! https://dl.dropbox.com/s/0b7zuprkhhclvq3/dghd.PNG
Well thanks for viewing this tutorial! Hope it helped you. Questions? Just hit me on PM box. Good luck with your servers !~

item.title: [PI] renaming client.jar [PI] //Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Not a single image works. This is by far the worst tutorial I’ve ever seen.

  1. You’re spoonfeeding a snippet. This isn’t even a tutorial. It’s changing a word.
  2. You based it off ONE type of client, not all.
  3. This is server tutorials, not client.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] renaming client.jar [PI] //Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @UpBeat UpBeat
item.description:
@UpBeat wrote:

Hey Mopar-Users,
This is my very first post, and tutorial. I am “AWARE” that everyone should know how to rename the client (run.bat), but that’s not what I want to get into. If you know how to do this already, don’t waist your time here. “Title Says It All” (I will be spoon-feeding) .:BeginnersPurposesONLY.:

https://dl.dropbox.com/s/5ghquordme3j5p0/Part%204.PNG

Purpose: helping those who: -uses a PI source
-doesn’t have GUI.java or JFrame.java file in the Client side
-have signed and made their client.jar

NOTE: I’ve haven’t seen a tutorial on this topic yet, just questions on it. Let me know if you see a tutorial on this, I’ll be willing to delete this, if majority agrees.

Difficulty: 1/10;
The Problem:
The name won’t change after trying to change it through GUI.java/JFrame.java/Client.java
https://dl.dropbox.com/s/akruqbmjnz1t8s2/9b8.png

!!Let’s Get Start!!

  1. Access your: Client Folder.
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/bn251s4g12we8sj/part%202.PNG
    and you’ll have something like these
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/f5nar9je3cylrno/Part%201.PNG

  2. Look for: RSFrame.java
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/2l8mf4k3w4vb1wj/sdfjhd.PNG

  3. Open; Insome cases: (Right-click>Edit): RSFrame.java
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/wtd66ssbinomaas/sdfa.PNG
    You will have something like this:
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/s3k2l7016jv23ih/untitled.PNG
    Look at: setTitle(“PvPscapez”); *or what-ever name it is.
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ra5jyg0qn0z34yu/sdhsd.PNG

  4. You should know what to do now…
    setTitle("“Enter Your Client Name Here”");
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/gcwagophq7nb2hr/asfsd.PNG
    Now: Save it…
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/c592eilofr81y17/adgds.PNG

  5. Compile: the Client Folder.
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/3jy62efol3idwjn/sdgsd.PNG

  6. Recreate and Sign your .jar.
    NOTE: You should know how to do this part, no need to spoonfeed you here.

  7. TADAAAH~ a successfull change!
    https://dl.dropbox.com/s/0b7zuprkhhclvq3/dghd.PNG

Well thanks for viewing this tutorial! Hope it helped you. Questions? Just hit me on PM box. Good luck with your servers !~

Read full topic
